detail_desc: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.

Oversized shirt jacket in sturdy wool with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with studded straps with a metal buckle, and a zip at one side. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and buttons down the front.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with stand-up collar and lined hood with press-studs at the front and a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, an adjustable tab with press-studs at the sides, fleece-lined, zipped front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim made from a soft, stretch Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist and slim, straight legs.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset and wide sides. Seamless.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs and a straight-cut hem. Ribbing around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Suede bucket bag with a metal chain shoulder strap, magnetic fastener at the top and zipped inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 22x18x9 cm.
Fine-knit T-shirt in slub cotton yarn with an open chest pocket with roll edge, seam centre back and roll edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Gently tailored, double-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Hooded cardigan in a soft, textured knit with a roll-edge hem and no buttons.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a flounced trim at the top. One top with an all-over print.
Jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Straight legs with sewn-on panels. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front, short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a high, elasticated waist and concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with creases.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back, canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Hat in a soft knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front, ears with sequins at the top, earflaps and ties underneath. Fleece lining.
Running top in jersey with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a linen and cotton blend with a zip fly and extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening at the waist. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.

Short, straight-cut coat in a sturdy wool blend with concealed press-studs at the front and a tie belt attached to the sides. Pockets in the side seams and one inner pocket. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the top.
Pool shoes with moulded soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fleece-lined jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and platform soles covered in braided jute. Canvas insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 4 cm.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Short, sleeveless dress in glittery jersey with a deep V-neck and elasticated spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Short cardigan in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and tie-front fastening.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves.
Gold-coloured bracelet of rectangular metal links with a toggle clasp. Length approx. 19.5 cm.
Trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Checked shirt in bleach-patterned cotton twill in an oversized style that tapers to the hem with a collar and classic front. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a yoke at the back and decorative seams.
High-waist culottes in a fine knit with a wide elasticated waistband with and wide legs.
Cropped vest top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a slight sheen.
Jumper in a soft knit with hole-knit sections. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved lace top with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, washed cotton with a zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in sturdy satin with a regular waist. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.
Long jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Straight style in a relaxed fit.
Short, fitted dress in twill with narrow shoulder straps and a zip at the back.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cropped trousers in pleated jersey with a regular, elasticated waist and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric and a lined hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and sides. Partly lined.
Dungaree dress in soft, stretch cotton denim with adjustable straps and a chest pocket. Unlined.

Set with a top and pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Top with a flounce-trimmed yoke, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric skirt. Lined.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric containing some wool. Low waist with covered elastication, a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases down the front and turn-ups at the hems. The trousers are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Wide jersey top in a soft viscose blend with embroidery, short sleeves and an opening with a button at the back.
Cardigan in soft, rib-knit cotton with a V-neck, long sleeves and wrapover front with a tie belt at the waist.
Pyjamas in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed-fit top with a print motif on the front, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Leggings in soft jersey with elastic at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a hood, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and short slits at the hems.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Double-breasted jacket in a jacquard weave made from a viscose blend containing glittery threads with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Wide waist panel.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in linen jersey with a gently rounded hem.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood, flap pockets and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
Short necklace made of wide, polished metal chain. Adjustable length 40-49 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative seams at the top and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Trousers in stretch, striped twill made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs that finish at the ankles.
